title: Mirrors - determine focal length from graph

content.description: Students collect data to determine the focal length of a converging mirror. They place an object at various distances from the mirror and then move a screen until they see a focused image of the object on a screen. The students measure the distances of the object and the image from the mirror. A graph of the data is shown.
content.question: What is the approximate focal length of the mirror?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
